product_name: REI Four Winds Carbon Travel Staff
long_description: The REI Four Winds Carbon travel staff is the ideal travel companion for wandering near or far. This lightweight walking staff compacts to easily slip into your luggage. 4-section pole collapses to 19.3 in., allowing it to be packed lengthwise in a standard 24 in. luggage. Titanal aluminum upper shaft and carbon fiber lower shaft offer strength and light weight; plus, they're highly resistant to abrasion and corrosion. External locking mechanism clasps sections securely in place at whatever lengths you need for changing terrain. Light foam grip is easy to grasp. Handle unscrews to reveal camera mount. Includes a basket and a vario tungsten carbide tip.
short_description: The REI Four Winds Carbon travel staff is the ideal travel companion for wandering near or far. This lightweight walking staff compacts to easily slip into your luggage.
